title: BaseBall Data
text: bbd (BaseBall Data) package lightweight package contains functions facilitate collection baseball data various sources online. package currently experimental. function interfaces liable change without notice. mature feature rich baseball data package, consider baseballr. Current data sources include: Statcast Baseball-Reference MLBAM Chadwick Baseball Bureau Register sources may added future.

title: BaseBall Data
text: can install development version bbd GitHub :

title: BaseBall Data
text: basic common usage bbd collecting Statcast data games played two dates, inclusive. default, bbd package attempts un-opinionated, thus returns table containing exact variables (extent possible) returned Statcast API. statcast() function provides arguments allow opinionated processing. Check documentation details processing. importantly, functionality obtain batter pitcher names included. functionality also provided default use opinionated statcast_bbd() function convenience.

what: Download Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
title: Download Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
text: Download Statcast data within range dates

title: Download Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
code: statcast(   start = Sys.Date() - 1,   end = NULL,   batter = NULL,   pitcher = NULL,   process = FALSE,   names = FALSE,   verbose = FALSE )  statcast_bbd(start = Sys.Date() - 1, end = NULL, verbose = FALSE)

title: Download Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
text: start Start date search. end End data search. Defaults NULL, stops search start date. batter Statcast player ID batter interest. Defaults NULL. pitcher Statcast player ID pitcher interest. Defaults NULL. process Controls processing data. Defaults FALSE. TRUE, data processed using statcast_min_process() function. names Controls processing names. Defaults FALSE. TRUE, names processed using statcast_add_names() function. verbose Controls messaging user. Defaults FALSE provides message. TRUE, informs user date begins downloading.

title: Download Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
text: object class table_class() containing Statcast events start date end date inclusive.
